description: Number of bracelets using a maximum of six different colored beads.
comments: Turning over will not create a new bracelet.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
formula: a(n) = sum phi(d)*6^(n/d)/2/n where d|n and a(n)=6^((n+1)/2)/2 for n odd and a(n)=7/4*6^(n/2) for n even.
crossrefs: Cf. a(n) = A081720(n,6), n>=6. [From _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 03 2012]
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
